snippet: Larry Eustachy’s successful coaching career crumbled at Iowa State in 2003, but now nine years sober, he has rebuilt his life and his career.
abstract: Profile of Southern Mississippi men's basketball coach Larry Eustachy, who is preparing his team for its first appearance in the NCAA tournament since 1991; Eustachy’s successful coaching career crumbled at Iowa State in 2003, but now nine years sober, he has rebuilt his life and his career.
lead_paragraph: Larry Eustachy’s successful coaching career crumbled at Iowa State in 2003, but now nine years sober, he has rebuilt his life and his career.

headline.seo: Coach Larry Eustachy Completes Long Road Back
headline.main: A Changed Coach Emerges From a Career in Ruins
headline.print_headline: A Changed Coach Emerges From a Career in Ruins
